channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of beauty deals this Cyber Monday right here at QVC. Whether you're looking for the latest in make-up or your skincare regime needs a serious update, bag an amazing beauty bargain.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tommie Copper
channel.desc: Whether you're an athlete looking to improve your performance, or someone simply looking to live their best active life, Tommie Copper is your trusted partner in total body wellness.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: NassifMD Skincare
channel.desc: Join us for this exciting beauty range developed by Dr Nassif. Discover products designed to boost your skin's natural radiance and appearance, delivering remarkable results.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: My Hair Doctor
channel.desc: Join us for My Hair Doctor from Guy Parsons, an industry professional whose knowledge of hair and scalp health, plus his hairdressing skills has enabled him to create this premium haircare range.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: UK Lash
channel.desc: Achieve dramatic eyes you can't wait to show off with UK Lash. With all the sassy products you need in your make-up bag, this show is for beauties like you.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Refresh
channel.desc: Feeling a little rundown after Christmas? Join us for the January Beauty Weekend show with brand new products, must-have favourites and Today's Special Value offers from Tria and Decleor.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: New In Beauty Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up your beauty routine and start the day with our fabulous selection of skincare, colour cosmetics and more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: NassifMD Skincare
channel.desc: Join us for this exciting beauty range developed by Dr Nassif. Discover products designed to boost your skin's natural radiance and appearance, delivering remarkable results.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tommie Copper
channel.desc: Whether you're an athlete looking to improve your performance, or someone simply looking to live their best active life, Tommie Copper is your trusted partner in total body wellness.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Alison Young
channel.desc: Explore botanical beauty secrets with Alison Young. Dive into skincare and cosmetics that celebrate nature's finest, offering you radiant and healthy-looking skin.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Algenist Skincare Takeover
channel.desc: Founded by a team of biotechnology scientists in San Francisco, Algenist offer a luxe range of anti-ageing skincare enriched with alguronic acid, to help reveal your most beautiful complexion.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: New In Beauty Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up your beauty routine and start the day with our fabulous selection of skincare, colour cosmetics and more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love, featuring Dyson's high-tech Supersonic Hairdryer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Refresh
channel.desc: Feeling a little rundown after Christmas? Join us for the January Beauty Weekend show with brand new products, must-have favourites and Today's Special Value offers from Tria and Decleor.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Day Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of top offers from some big names in our Beauty Day event.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Hair by Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Internationally renowned Philip Kingsley and his team give expert tips and tricks on how to get the best results for your hair and scalp.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: NassifMD Skincare
channel.desc: Join us for this exciting beauty range developed by Dr Nassif. Discover products designed to boost your skin's natural radiance and appearance, delivering remarkable results.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: New In Beauty Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up your beauty routine and start the day with our fabulous selection of skincare, colour cosmetics and more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Day Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of top offers from some big names in our Beauty Day event.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: London Town
channel.desc: From your fingertips to your toes, discover Londontown's collection of exquisite shades and long-lasting formulas for a perfect manicure every time.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Refresh
channel.desc: Feeling a little rundown after Christmas? Join us for the January Beauty Weekend show with brand new products, must-have favourites and Today's Special Value offers from Tria and Decleor.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tili Beauty
channel.desc: Effortlessly update your daily beauty routine with Tili, from beauty tools and everyday essentials, to expert developed fitness and wellbeing items, we've got you covered. Try it, love it with Tili.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Experts with Dr Nassif
channel.desc: Discover expert hints, tips and products from NassifMD.
